Text:
one of the most acclaimed war games in recent years, we now move from the conflict in North Africa during the 2nd World War to the battles in Russia

A war game set in World War II with great realism and graphics, you can move from the battlefields of Stalingrad through hell africa campaign to return to the sands of Normandy but not in the same way.

Call of Duty is a game of unprecedented military action, where you are the protagonist and everything happens so fast that any action you take is crucial.



Operating System: Windows 2000/XP Processor: Pentium 1.4GHz or AMD Athlon XP 1700 or higher Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX v9.0c Graphics card: 64 MB VRAM

Recommended System: Pentium 4, 1GB of RAM, VGA support Shaders.

ENJOY
